lead_paragraph: Also invited is Jim Obergefell, the lead plaintiff in the Supreme Court case legalizing gay marriage, and others who illustrate America as “inclusive and compassionate.”

headline.print_headline: Guests Selected to Show ‘Who We Are’
headline.main: Obama’s Guests at State of the Union Include Syrian Refugee and Mexican Immigrant

snippet: Also invited is Jim Obergefell, the lead plaintiff in the Supreme Court case legalizing gay marriage, and others who illustrate America as “inclusive and compassionate.”
abstract: Roster of official guests scheduled to attend Pres Obama's final State of the Union address includes several figures associated with issues and initiatives that have defined Obama's presidency, from gay marriage to immigration; White House announcement states guests are intended to illustrate diversity, compassion, courage and innovation of Americans.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
